I have the following ant script for JUnit:

<junit showoutput="yes" printsummary="yes" haltonfailure="no">
          <classpath refid="test.classpath"/>
          <formatter type="brief" usefile="false"/>
  		  <formatter type="xml"/>
          <batchtest fork="yes" todir="${testdir}\ca">
            <fileset dir="${src_ca}">
              <include name="**/junit/**/Test*.class" />
              <exclude name="**/TestRunner.class" />
            </fileset>
          </batchtest>
        </junit>


When I run the build I get the following errors for my tests:
